name: Program intervals table should not contain orphaned entries
fullName: features/data_integrity.feature:Program intervals table should not contain orphaned entries
description:
As a TV scheduling system administrator
I want to ensure that all programs in the programs table have corresponding entries in the program_intervals table
So that I can maintain data consistency and completeness across the system
descriptionHtml:
As a TV scheduling system administrator
I want to ensure that all programs in the programs table have corresponding entries in the program_intervals table
So that I can maintain data consistency and completeness across the system

testStage.description:
As a TV scheduling system administrator
I want to ensure that all programs in the programs table have corresponding entries in the program_intervals table
So that I can maintain data consistency and completeness across the system

steps.name: And I load the full day programming schedule from CSV file "full_day_programs.csv"

attachments.name: Full Day Schedule Loaded from CSV

steps.name: When I query both programs and program_intervals tables
Then every entry in the program_intervals table should have a corresponding program in the programs table

parameters.name: test_context
parameters.value: {'programs': [RealDictRow([('program_name', ''), ('start_time', datetime.time(22, 0)), ('end_time', datetime.time(0, 0))]), RealDictRow([('program_name', 'Afternoon Drama'), steps.name: And there should be no orphaned intervals
